EmailTemplate.name: 2019.11.19 - ISO Holiday Campaign Eblast Michael.Michael-ISO-Holiday-Campaign-Em
EmailTemplate.subject: Hello & Holiday Greetings
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hi {{lead.First Name:default=Valued Customer}},
With the busy holiday season on its way, I just wanted to reach out and wish you Happy Holidays.
To help you celebrate the upcoming holidays, I put together a special promo code for you called, HOLIDAY, which provides you with 15% OFF your order of $75 or more. You can use this promo code until December 20th, 2019 on anything except paper.
Make sure to sign in to your account at https://www.grandandtoy.com/Account/Logon <[[https://www.grandandtoy.com/Account/Logon?cmp=PricePlan_PROMO&utm_source={{my.UTM Source}}&utm_medium={{my.UTM Medium}}&utm_content={{my.UTM Content}}&utm_campaign={{my.UTM Campaign}}]]> to place your order. Best,
Michael Dixon Inside Account Manager
900 Belfast Road, Ottawa, ON K1G 0Z7 E-mail: MichaelDixon@grandandtoy.com <[[mailto:MichaelDixon@grandandtoy.com]]> | Tel: 1-800-348-2184 Ext: 42532 Fax: 1-613-244-0765 Toll Free/Sans Frais Fax: 1-866-391-8555 Office Supplies | Cleaning & Breakroom | Interiors & Furniture | Technology | Print & Documents
grandandtoy.com <[[https://www.grandandtoy.com/?cmp=PricePlan_PROMO&utm_source={{my.UTM Source}}&utm_medium={{my.UTM Medium}}&utm_content={{my.UTM Content}}&utm_campaign={{my.UTM Campaign}}]]> CONFIDENTIALITY NOTICE: The content of this e-mail (and attachments, if any) is privileged and confidential, and intended solely for its designated recipient(s). Any dissemination, distribution or copying of this e-mail, other than by its intended recipient(s), is strictly prohibited. If you have received this e-mail by error, please delete it and notify us immediately by reply e-mail.
